mapper.select: select count(*) from class_qa where TUTOR_ID=#{mid}
select count(*) from class_qa where WRITER_ID=#{mid}

select newq.class_nm_s,newq.class_qa_no,newQ.class_qa_cate, newQ.writer_id, newQ.class_qa_date, newQ.class_qa_title,newQ.class_qa_content,newQ.class_qa_answer from( SELECT class_nm_s,class_qa_no, class_qa_cate, writer_id, class_qa_date, class_qa_title,class_qa_content,qa.class_qa_answer FROM class_qa qa,class c, member m where qa.class_no = c.class_no and qa.writer_id = m.mid) newQ where newQ.class_qa_no = #{class_qa_no}

select CLASS_QA_NO, CLASS_QA_CATE, CLASS_QA_TITLE, CLASS_QA_DATE, CLASS_QA_CONTENT, CLASS_QA_ANSWER, WRITER_ID, member.MNICK, TUTOR_ID, CLASS_NO from class_qa, member where class_qa.WRITER_ID = member.mid and class_no = #{class_no} order by CLASS_QA_NO desc
mapper.update: UPDATE class_qa set class_qa_answer=#{class_qa_answer} where class_qa_no=#{class_qa_no}
